10:T565,The information contained in this website has been prepared solely for the purpose of providing information about activities of the Foundation of Promotion of Sports and Games and its associated members, only to interested persons and associations, and is not in any way binding on this website. All content included on this site, such as text, logo, photographs and the compilation of this content are the property of the FPSG, or its content suppliers. Due to unavailability of certain photographs there may be certain pictures, which are not the property of the FPSG. In case any pictures that are not a property of FPSG, and is violating any of your copyrights, then please let us know at the earliest. We shall take the necessary steps once confirmed that it is not our property. Any other use, including the reproduction, modification, distribution, transmission, republication, display or performance, of the content on this site is strictly prohibited. By accessing this website, you agree that the website will not be liable for any direct or indirect loss arising from the use of the information and the material contained in this Web Site.
